title: Algorithms
description: Design and analysis of algorithms, complexity theory, and advanced problem-solving techniques.
objectives: Analyze time and space complexity of algorithms
Design efficient algorithms for various problems
Understand advanced data structures and their applications
Apply algorithmic techniques to real-world problems
outcomes: Students can analyze algorithm complexity using Big-O notation
Students can design optimal solutions for computational problems
Students understand graph algorithms and their applications
Students can implement advanced sorting and searching algorithms
feedback: Great use of visual aids for complex concepts
